body.p:
Mt. Sterling Ky,
Jan. 6th 65
S. P. Love Esq
Dr Sir

You promised to arrange my part of that bail bond business if I would take no further step in it -- I have not heard from you since -- Our Court comes on again the 2nd Monday of February -- I am still disposed to give you no further case & trouble in the matter if you will forward me a check for $130 -- $20 less than my legal per cent -- I will send you such a receipt as will make your co-security contribute, or so you can have your mortgage, which you hold as colateral, good for it -- The bond is $500 -- You will benefit yourself by attending to this on receipt of this

yours &c
J. S. Dury
Comth Atty.
